title: Senior Brand Designer
job_overview:
For designers who live and breathe visual consistency, storytelling, and strong brand systems.

We’re searching for a senior-level brand designer to bring our visual identity to life across social media posts, static ads, infographics, carousels, landing page assets, and more. You’ll be responsible for creating on-brand visual content that looks like it belongs in the feed of top-performing wellness and lifestyle brands—think PetLab Co., Dore & Rose, Spacegoods, and Huel.

This is not a junior design role. We’re only looking for designers who understand brand systems and can execute high-quality visuals with precision, even when working from templates or generating AI content.

? What You’ll Do:

– Design branded static content for social media, ads, carousels, infographics, email banners, and product visuals
– Translate concepts and briefs into clean, conversion-driven visuals using brand colors, fonts, and tone
– Use platforms like Upgrade to see actual info, Canva templates, or custom frameworks for faster execution
– Leverage AI tools (Midjourney, Firefly, DALL·E, ChatGpt etc.) to generate image assets when needed
– Collaborate with our marketing and copy team to bring strong messaging to life visually
– Maintain and evolve visual brand consistency across all touchpoints

???? What We’re Looking For:

– Proven senior brand designer with a portfolio showing strong branding and visual systems
– Deep understanding of typography, layout, and visual hierarchy in the context of performance design
– Experience designing in styles similar to Huel, Spacegoods, Dore & Rose, and PetLab Co.
– Strong command of tools like Photoshop, Illustrator, Figma, Canva, or similar
– Skilled in using design templates and creative assets libraries efficiently
– Bonus: Familiarity with ads and DTC e-commerce creatives
– Detail-oriented, responsive, and comfortable with remote async work

? Please Do Not Apply If:

– You’re just starting out or cannot showcase prior branding work
– You don’t have experience working with defined brand guidelines
– You rely on trends but don’t understand the structure behind good design
– You struggle to balance creativity with clarity and conversion

???? How We Work:

– Fully remote and async-friendly
– Clear briefs, fast feedback loops
– Long-term role with room to grow into creative leadership

???? How to Apply:

Please send us:
– A short introduction about yourself
– Your portfolio link (must include work like the references above)
– Your expected monthly salary in USD
